HostSlick.com – E5 Dedicated Servers from 44.99€/mo (Normally 59€/mo) hosted in The Netherlands!

dedicated servers, hostslick, netherlands July 13, 2020 @ 6:26 am, by Jon Biloh

Max from HostSlick sent us this offer and we’re excited about this one because it’s a bit different from what we’ve been featuring recently with deeply discounted dedicated servers in The Netherlands. They’ve been featured on LowEndBox three times before, which you can check out here.

In their own words:

“We run our own AS208046 and are Located in the old KPN tower in Lelystad, Netherlands which is now owned by Cellnex.  The Tower is part of the Dutch Emergency Infrastructure and is one of the only Datacenters in the Area that is above Netherlands flood risks, which makes it a secure place for Customers Data, compared to some other Datacenters.

I’m not only an Entrepreneur but its my hobby and livelong project. 10 Years ago I started with a cPanel/WHM Reseller. Which I moved then to a Dedicated Server in 2012 where we also offered OpenVZ6 VPS. It grow and grow in the years, we rented more and more Dedicated Servers until 2 years ago when we started owning Hardware. Since April 2019 we are selling Dedicated Servers and now we are getting larger and larger.  Running close to 150 Servers. All Servers and Hardware is 100% owned by HostSlick, not some banks or leasing providers.”

They’re a VAT Registered Business in Germany under VAT No.: DE309438342

TOS is available and their WHOIS is public.

Accepted payment methods: Bitcoin, Credit Card, PayPal, SEPA Bank Transfer, Giropay, Paysafecard

Here are the offers:
